column5: Do you remember when you were in high school, chatting about over the future, and all that you plan on doing and acheiving. Huddled up in the no smoking section lighting up fireworks and smokes and having a great laugh, for the teachers to be sort of entertained juring lunch hour. .  Do you recall the promisary notes that you told your buds, if that in the future if you need anything, Im here for you.  20 or so yrs later, that did come to life and as promised to him. Delivery in two days and I hope he sleeps well, hes going to need it! 5 kids, a house and a divorce. And its not his fault by any means! A futton bed is on its way for my old friend  I just wanted to share this with all of you And another apple may have fallen very close to this particular situation
WTG Vin !!! You are a good man.
new beginnigs in life can be hard & painfull.. when long time friends help. its priceless!!   	well done friends are hard to find..
There but for the Grace, Vin Respect for standing up and remembering what's important
Vin, where is he. I am moving and have a couch, dresser and maybe a couple other things he can have. Let me know.
I also know a fellow going through tough times..As soon as he was locked out at work the wife said "I want a divorce".....I guess she was only in it for the cash...
Thanks for the kind words and jestures. We will probably reunit, with a few others for a brew next week.
Vinni ....your old... . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . and wise . . . . . . . . . . . and a man of stellar character  Good on ya ...and take your old friend fishing ....after all >>>>it heals ALL!
